about.title: About Me
about.name: Radhika Nitin Borse
about.description: Professional makeup artist specializing in bridal, party, and editorial looks. 2+ years, 300+ happy clients across Burhanpur, Khandwa & Indore.

services.title: Professional Makeup Services
services.subtitle: Bridal, party, and editorial makeup services tailored to make you feel absolutely stunning!

bridal.title: Bridal Makeup
bridal.description: Complete bridal transformation with HD makeup, hair styling, draping & accessories.

preWedding.title: Pre-Wedding Events
preWedding.description: Stunning looks for engagement, mehendi, sangeet & haldi ceremonies.

party.title: Party & Events
party.description: Glamorous makeup for cocktails, receptions, birthdays & corporate events.

editorial.title: Editorial & Photoshoot
editorial.description: Professional camera-ready makeup for fashion shoots and portfolio building.

family.title: Family Package
family.description: Coordinated makeup for mother of bride/groom, bridesmaids & family members.

trial.title: Trial Session
trial.description: Pre-wedding trials to finalize your perfect bridal look with expert consultation.

pricing.title: Makeup Service Packages
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing for all your makeup needs. All packages include premium products and personalized consultation.

trial.name: Makeup Trial
trial.includes: Consultation, Trial Look, Product Testing, Color Matching

engagement.name: Engagement Look
engagement.includes: HD Makeup Application, Basic Hair Styling, Eye Makeup, False Lashes, Touch-up Kit

reception.name: Reception Glam
reception.includes: Premium HD Makeup, Advanced Hair Styling, Contouring & Highlighting, Premium Lashes, Draping Assistance, Touch-up Kit

bridal.name: Bridal Package
bridal.includes: Luxury HD Bridal Makeup, Bridal Hair Styling, Full Face Contouring, Premium Lash Extensions, Saree Draping, Accessory Setting, Touch-up Kit, 2 Hours Service

fullWedding.name: Full Wedding Package
fullWedding.includes: 4 Different Looks, All Day Coverage, Premium Products Only, Complete Styling, Draping for All Events, Personal Touch-up Kit, Priority Booking
